Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: “Early Years” depicts his adolescence up until his entrance into the Art School of Tokyo (now called Tokyo University of Arts); “Later Years” portrays after he graduated art school.
